name: Joe Whittle
title: Security Engineer
summary: Security Engineer with hands-on experience in incident response, IAM, endpoint security, automation, and vulnerability management. Proven ability to lead responses to cloud-based incidents and to implement automation that reduces operational toil and improves detection and response times.
highlights: Directed response efforts for 50+ cloud-based security incidents, improving resolution time by 40% through automation and playbooks.
Implemented centralized IdP with Okta for 150+ applications, reducing onboarding time by ~30% and improving access efficiency.
Led transition to next-generation endpoint solutions improving detection and response by 60%.
Automated IOC enrichment and detection workflows saving ~20 hours per week.
Maintained 98% closure rate for high-priority vulnerabilities through CVSS-driven remediation workflows.

description: Incident Response Leadership: Directed response efforts for 50+ cloud-based security incidents, improving resolution time by 40% through process automation and incident playbooks.
Identity & Access Management: Implemented centralized IdP with Okta, integrating 150+ apps and improving onboarding and access management efficiency.
Endpoint Security: Managed and transitioned endpoint security to next-gen EDR/RMM solutions, improving detection and response times by ~60%.
Automation & Scripting: Developed Python and SQL scripts for IOC enrichment, reducing manual work by ~20 hours/week and improving detection accuracy.
Event Monitoring Optimization: Enhanced event monitoring and alerting, reducing false positives by ~30% and improving team efficiency by ~25%.
IAM Policy Enforcement: Defined and enforced IAM policies in AWS and Okta, reducing over-permissioned access by ~45%.
Compliance & Data Privacy: Automated DSAR workflows to improve GDPR/CCPA handling and reduce customer service workload.
Vulnerability Management: Led CVSS-based remediation efforts, reducing resolution time by ~50% and maintaining a 98% SLA closure rate for high-priority items.
IT Operations Automation: Contributed to IT management automation and provisioning workflows, reducing operational overhead by ~40%.
Deployed and administered corporate Cisco networking across multiple floors; implemented VLAN segmentation and core switch redundancy.
Managed Windows/Linux systems administration including imaging, patching, and endpoint lifecycle management.
Integrated IAM workflows between Active Directory and Okta; maintained RBAC policy integrity.
Provided Tier 2–3 support for infrastructure, VPN, and networking; participated in access reviews and SOC2-aligned audits.
Provided technical support resolving ~95% of hardware and software issues within 24 hours, improving reliability and user satisfaction.
Assisted with network administration and monitoring, contributing to a 20% improvement in network uptime.
Managed lifecycle of 500+ IT assets with accurate tracking and zero inventory discrepancies.
Supported deployment and configuration of IT systems to meet business needs.
Managed asset inventory and field logistics across 20+ event teams; coordinated hardware shipments and lifecycle tracking.
Led a combat team during deployment to Afghanistan; executed mission-critical objectives under high-pressure conditions.
